TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SgdCalibratedTrainer extends Microsoft.ML.Trainers.SgdBinaryTrainerBase`1<class Microsoft.ML.Calibrators.CalibratedModelParametersBase`2<class Microsoft.ML.Trainers.LinearBinaryModelParameters, class Microsoft.ML.Calibrators.PlattCalibrator>>
Public NotInheritable Class SgdCalibratedTrainer Inherits SgdBinaryTrainerBase(Of CalibratedModelParametersBase(Of LinearBinaryModelParameters, PlattCalibrator))

Docs.summary: The for training logistic regression using a parallel stochastic gradient method. The trained model is calibrated and can produce probability by feeding the output value of the linear function to a .

remarks.format:
To create this trainer, use [SgdCalibrated](xref:Microsoft.ML.StandardTrainersCatalog.SgdCalibrated(Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationCatalog.BinaryClassificationTrainers,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Single)) or [SgdCalibrated(Options)](xref:Microsoft.ML.StandardTrainersCatalog.SgdCalibrated(Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationCatalog.BinaryClassificationTrainers,Microsoft.ML.Trainers.SgdCalibratedTrainer.Options)).
